titles.title: To urge the resolution of claims related to the confiscation of certain property by the Government of Italy.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

bill.summary: 6/16/2004--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that: (1) the Government of Italy should fulfill the requirements of the Treaty of Friendship, Commerce and Navigation between the United States and the Italian Republic with respect to the property of Mr. Pier Talenti that was confiscated by Italy, and make reasonable efforts to resolve Mr. Talenti's claims; and (2) the Secretary of State should continue to press the Government of Italy to resolve Mr. Talenti's claims, and take any further measures that could assist Mr. Talenti in receiving such compensation.
